code: @Test public void testSimpleTryFinally() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:try").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:finally").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").doTry().to("mock:try").doFinally().to("mock:finally").end().to("mock:result").         }     }. }
